
# required
# the url from where to download
# is in most times the url of that page, where all chapter are listed
url=

# optional
# pattern of the chapters to download
# if left empty all chapters are downloaded
# see readme for description
pattern=

# dependant
# to export the links to JDownloader (to use FolderWatch) add the path to the folderwatch-folder in your local jd-installation
# example: jdfw=C:/Program Files/JDownloader2/folderwatch
# important: use only forward slashes (/)
jdfw=

# optional
# set this to use a proxy. Basic authentication is supported
# Example: http://user:password@example.com:8000/
proxy=
